EifieldController: A role allowing the use of dangerous Eifield commands.
notInVoiceChannel: You are not in any voice channel and this command requires it.
cantJoinVoiceChannel: Unable to join the voice channel.
errorCommand: An error occurred while executing the command.
errorDeleteMsg: An error occurred while deleting the messages.
forbiddenCommand: 🚫 You do not have permission to access this command. 🚫
notInSameVoiceChannel: You are not in the same voice channel as the bot.
